title: I cannot get into loading screen after champion select anymore
body:
Brief background info. I have been playing league on this computer for over a year its a 2 year old laptop. High end at time of purchase ($1899.99) Never have I had any issues on my end before.
The other day I got a bug splat transitioning from champions select to loading screen.
At this point I get a black screen after champion select where I should be transitioning into loading screen.
Since that point I can not join or spectate any games. I have repaired client, Reinstalled LoL, Updated my OS.
There is a history of people facing this issue I have included just one thread below
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2729407&page=5
There is no acknowledgement from Riot.
Out of the blue I can no longer play LoL on my computer. Has anyone else faced this issue before?

replies.body:
Bugsplats are often caused by Operating system or hardware issues. While there are a number of specifics causes for these issues, our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) addresses the most common solutions.

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through that guide.
